## LabelFlyoutInflater class

Class responsible for creating labels for flyouts.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class LabelFlyoutInflater implements IFlyoutInflater 
```
**Implements:** [IFlyoutInflater](./blockly.iflyoutinflater.md)

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disposeItem(item)](./blockly.labelflyoutinflater.disposeitem.md) |  | Disposes of the given label. |
|  [gapForItem(state, defaultGap)](./blockly.labelflyoutinflater.gapforitem.md) |  | Returns the amount of space that should follow this label. |
|  [getType()](./blockly.labelflyoutinflater.gettype.md) |  | Returns the type of items this inflater is responsible for creating. |
|  [load(state, flyout)](./blockly.labelflyoutinflater.load.md) |  | Inflates a flyout label from the given state and adds it to the flyout. |
